ValidationRule.description: Require Display Shipping Country when Account.Type = Prospect
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( TEXT(Type)="Prospect", TEXT(Display_Shipping_Country__c)="", NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation) ), AND( TEXT(Display_Shipping_Country__c)="", $Permission.By_Pass_Validation = false ,OR( !ISBLANK(ShippingCity), !ISBLANK(ShippingState), !ISBLANK(ShippingStreet), !ISBLANK(ShippingCountry), !ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate a Display Shipping Country value
